name: Here we go again (early)
description:
You have to solve puzzles in a limited time

And everytime the timer runs out, your past self plays the level again, along with you!

Have your past self execute the right choreography and you will solve the puzzle!

An unfinished prototype for the game plus jam (the theme is "time")

Controls : 

WASD - movement

Left mouse button - interact

R - reset the level

M - open the menu
